name: full-stack-chat-app
description: Real-time chat application with React, Firebase, and Appwrite

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.install:types: cd client && npm install --save-dev @types/react @types/react-dom && cd ../server && npm install --save-dev @types/express firebase-admin
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
